articles.author: Canadian Press
articles.title: New Brunswick says about 50,000 doses away from hitting Monday's vaccination target - Burnaby Now
articles.description: FREDERICTON — New Brunswick's government is opening walk-in COVID-19 vaccine clinics to help it reach its goal of having 75 per cent of the population 12 and older vaccinated by Monday.
articles.content:
